popt4jlib.neural.costfunction

Class ThresErrorCounterReg

  • java.lang.Object
    • popt4jlib.neural.costfunction.ThresErrorCounter
      • popt4jlib.neural.costfunction.ThresErrorCounterReg
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, FunctionIntf

    public class ThresErrorCounterReg
extends ThresErrorCounter
    implements the regularized version of the ThresErrorCounter function, where besides the threshold-based counting of the errors, we add to the result the magnitude of the weights (multiplied by a λ factor) as regularization component.

    Title: popt4jlib

    Description: A Parallel Meta-Heuristic Optimization Library in Java

    Copyright: Copyright (c) 2011-2020

    Company:

    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Ioannis T. Christou
    See Also:

      public constructor sets the regularization factor (may be overriden in the params of the eval() function call.)

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      double eval(java.lang.Object arg, java.util.HashMap params)
      computes and returns the number of components that deviate from zero too much, plus the L2-norm of the weights multiplied by a λ factor that may be optionally included in the params.

    • Method Detail

      • eval

        public double eval(java.lang.Object arg,
                   java.util.HashMap params)
        computes and returns the number of components that deviate from zero too much, plus the L2-norm of the weights multiplied by a λ factor that may be optionally included in the params.
        Specified by:
        eval in interface FunctionIntf
        Overrides:
        eval in class ThresErrorCounter
        Parameters:
        arg - Object // double[]
        params - HashMap may contain a key-value pair of the form <"ffnn.errorcountthres",$val$>. Default is 1.e-6. It must contain a key-value pair of the form <"ffnn.weights", double[] weights> that are the weights. May also contain an optional <"ffnn.lambda",Double> pair that will override the current _lambda value.
        Returns:
        double
